channel.title: Helpp!
channel.description:
Help please!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
when you type user and pass and when it says ''error connecting to server''
whats the file called??? (client sided ofc)

item.title: Helpp!
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:420899”][quote author=rudeboijaz link=topic=523573.msg3808374#msg3808374 date=1320689223]
Help please!!!

when you type user and pass and when it says ‘‘error connecting to server’’

whats the file called??? (client sided ofc)
[/quote]
It’s the file called. Ud better don’t start coding.java[/quote]
umm what?

Check client.java and make sure the ip address is set to either 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0.

If you still dont know what I mean you have a lot to learn. Nothing hard gl

Read full topic
